name: Moto Hill Jumper
description:
Drive motorcycle on the hills and jump over cars, trucks and other obstacles avoiding crashing. Perform wheelies, backflips and frontflips to get bonus points. Unlock the new and faster motorcycles to finish all levels.

Control your motorcycle in the air to land safely!

Features:
- realistic gameplay,
- 3 motocross bikes,
- over 40 unique levels,
- nice graphics,
- physics and engine sounds
...and more!

Have a good fun!

Preview background music:
Funk Game Loop Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
